content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Munich, let me emphasize that during this negotiation, we will solely focus on discussing the rental price. As the landlord seeking the highest possible return on my investment, I'll start with a price of 1400 Euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
